AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hobbit famous relative
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME is the descendant, however distant, of a famed hobbit of local legend, or derives HIS lineage from one of the many great hobbit families. HECAP developed a silver spoon after socializing with countless distant relatives.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hobbit know-it-all
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME had a gift for collecting things, keeping records, and recalling old legends of heroes and adventurers at a moment’s notice. HISCAP desire to share HIS knowledge made HIM somewhat of a conversationalist as well. HECAP spent so much time observing and researching, however, that HE was well known to fall over like an ent during any arm wrestling contests.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hobbit troublemaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME spent HIS childhood being a nuisance to HIS neighbors and relatives. From years of running away from responsibilities, HE learned how to be exceedingly fast, how to dodge incoming attacks, and how to escape from most of his potential captors.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hobbit soft-spoken
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was well known for being an incredibly kind and thoughtful child. However, HE spent most of HIS time in social situations listening rather than speaking to avoid interrupting other people's trains of thought.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hobbit mean-spirited
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME realized how to be the center of attention early on in life. Once HE started saying mean things to others to make HIS friends laugh, HE learned two things. One, how to start fights. Two, how to make other hobbits cry.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hobbit know-nothing
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME took pride in knowing as little as possible. HIS parents assured HIM that so-called -learning- was just wasting valuable time HE could be spending helping tend to the weeds. Intellectual and artistic disabled.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hobbit grabby-hands
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: No matter how NAME’s parents tried, they could never get HIM to keep HIS little hobbit hands to HIMself. HECAP always wanted more of everything. Everything was -precious- to HIM. On the positive side, HE learned quite a lot of survivalist cooking after being banished after one of his friends mysteriously drowned.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hobbit clumsy-fool
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME broke dishes, burned meals, dropped lembas in mud, lost the sheep, forgot HIS homework, swore in-front of grandma, shot dad in the rear-end with an arrow, and nearly died every season. How HE has survived to adulthood is anyone’s guess.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hobbit adventurer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: It is a rare hobbit that leaves their home in search of fame and fortune in far flung lands. This makes NAME a bit queer in the eyes of HIS fellow hobbits, yet HE feels destined to go out there and back again.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hobbit burglar
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Hobbits are quiet, nimble creatures when they put their minds to it. An expert burglar like NAME can make HIMself scarce when trouble arrives. Burglars are even rumored to be so skilled at thieving, they could even steal gold from 'neath a dragon's nose! But what are the chances of that?

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hobbit drunk
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A common sight among hobbits is the least industrious sort -- the drunkard. NAME called everyone his friend after a few drinks, and for years, HE would wake up somewhere new every morning. HECAP would gladly tell you the stories of his adventures, if HE could remember any of them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hobbit gourmand
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Hobbits cannot stand for long without good cooking, and some, like the gourmand, demand only the best. NAME spent years leading cooks around by the nose and teaching others the ways to best cook food. Once HIS popularity rose for critiquing cuisine, HE took to eating food more than preparing it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hobbit layabout
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: It is well-known that hobbits are afforded a rather peaceful life. NAME was one of the layabouts -- the most sluggish of hobbits. HECAP made it HIS goal in life to simply have no goal -- complete leisure and relaxation in all things.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hobbit farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: How can a hobbit enjoy their second breakfast without farmers? NAME was born to till the soil. HE has no time for shenanigans and is often very terse. Yet HIS hard work shines through, as long as there aren't any Tooks about.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hobbit gardener
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Hobbits also often take on simple occupations -- such as the gardener. NAME thrived amongst the golden mallorn flowers of the shire and always looked for just the right way to raise HIS saplings and seedlings. Gardening wasn't just HIS occupation, but it was HIS muse.
